DOC.detailed_description: This phase I , randomize , single-blind , placebo control , sequential-group design study ass safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) pharmacodynamics ( PD ) AZD7594 single multiple ascend dos give daily inhalation healthy male Japanese subject , compare placebo
